text: [Music]
you know I i' I've definitely made a lot
of mistakes just based on my um I'm very
optimistic and I think most
entrepreneurs are so if I come up with
an idea of like oh this would be a great
place for us to sell Toms or a great
opportunity for us to really
revolutionize this concept in the
business you know I I tend to not see
why it won't work I only see why it will
work and that does get in the way
sometimes as as a business person a
perfect example is um when we started
selling Toms we sold them in these
really cool canvas bags and they were
everyone thought they were beautiful
they were simplistic they were good for
the environment because we didn't have
the cardboard and the packaging and and
everyone loved them and when we first
started selling Toms we were only
selling in little boutiques so it's fine
they could you manage you know 20 50
canvas bags of TOMS very easily in a
basket by you know by the checkout well
then we started selling in Nordstrom and
you know we thought oh this is great
we're selling in Nordstrom we'll
continue with this canvas bags but
Nordstrom is built upon a very specific
you know kind of um you know methods and
and protocol and and they have stock
rooms and in their stock rooms they
stack these boxes and they are very
organized and it allows their employees
to go in and out and sell lots of shoes
in an hour period of time well what
happened with the bags is even though
everyone loved it including Nordstrom
you know we didn't really listen to the
advice of the stock room people said we
really should use boxes CU this is going
to be a tangled mess with these bags
these strings and sure enough we
launched Nordstrom to Great excitement
in the consumer side and great
excitement on the sales people but two
weeks after we're there all our bags
were a big pile of mess in the stock
room and they couldn't sell any shoes
because they didn't want to waste half
an hour going and untangling the shoes
when they could have gotten you know
commission selling three other pairs of
coons so our business really took a hit
this last year and we had to transform
everything from bags to boxes which was
a big big uh um change for us and it and
it cost us a lot of money and a lot of
time but now we are in boxes and we're
seeing great sell through in Nordstrom
again so it's a perfect example
